nodes.text: The R/M Facility Four deepdock was a deepdock located in orbit of the planet Belderone, maintained by the Galactic Empire in 14 BBY. It was considered to be heavily fortified and had enough space for several CR90 corvettes, Carrack-class light cruisers, Victory-class Star Destroyers and at least one Venator-class Star Destroyer, the Liberator.

The R/M Facility Four deepdock was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Tarkin, a 2014 novel written by James Luceno. The deepdock was originally created for the Star Wars Legends continuity's 1989 Imperial Sourcebook, written by Greg Gorden.
